org.apache.flink.runtime.rest.handler.legacy.metrics

类 MetricStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.rest.handler.legacy.metrics.MetricStore

  • @ThreadSafe
public class MetricStore
extends java.lang.Object
    Nested data-structure to store metrics.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  MetricStore.ComponentMetricStore
      Structure containing metrics of a single component.
      private static class  MetricStore.JobMetricStore
      Sub-structure containing metrics of a single Job.
      static class  MetricStore.TaskManagerMetricStore
      Sub-structure containing metrics of a single TaskManager.
      static class  MetricStore.TaskMetricStore
      Sub-structure containing metrics of a single Task.

        参数:
        tmID - taskmanager ID
        返回:
        TaskManagerMetricStore for the given ID, or null if no store for the given argument exists

      • getTaskMetricStore

        public MetricStore.TaskMetricStore getTaskMetricStore(java.lang.String jobID,
                                                      java.lang.String taskID)
        Returns the MetricStore.ComponentMetricStore for the given job/task ID.
        参数:
        jobID - job ID
        taskID - task ID
        返回:
        ComponentMetricStore for given IDs, or null if no store for the given arguments exists

      • getSubtaskMetricStore

                                                              java.lang.String taskID,
                                                              int subtaskIndex)
        Returns the MetricStore.ComponentMetricStore for the given job/task ID and subtask index.
        参数:
        jobID - job ID
        taskID - task ID
        subtaskIndex - subtask index
        返回:
        SubtaskMetricStore for the given IDs and index, or null if no store for the given arguments exists
